data.description: An interface to the classic EZTWAIN library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides users with an interface to the classic EZTWAIN
    library, whichs gives users the possibility to scan images to a file
    or to the windows clipboard. Since there are no modules (yet) for
    scanner devices (for as far I know), I thought it would be usefull
    to create a subclass Scanner. This allows developers to create other
    interfaces to windows scanner devices whithout having namespace
    problems, these modules could live happily next to
    Win32::Scanner::EZTWAIN. Hence the namespace choice.
